name: The SPACE FUNERAL Collection
description:
[TW: THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS, JUMPSCARES AND VERY BAD LANGUAGE.]

[This game has no relations to Space Funeral, by thecatamites.]


A prequel story to Lisa Is Fearless, entailing high school student Benny's transformation into god of chaos Mysterious Benny, in the form of 2 short 1 minute walking simulators and 1 10 minute long visual novel.
